title: Furniture of America Basonne Glam Fabric Nailhead Trim Loveseat in Blue
features: SOFT TEXTURE - The fabric is smooth to the touch, making this a comfortable piece to lounge and relax on
Materials: Solid Wood, Wood Veneer, Polyester
description: Transform a seating area into a chic, stylish lounge with the luxurious design of this traditional fabric sofa. With decorative button tufting and nailhead trim enhancing its elegant, curved silhouette, this fabric loveseat is rounded out with luxe, flannelette upholstery in a blue fabric, one of three gorgeous colors available. A solid wood frame offers exceptional sturdiness and support for your living room lounging pleasure.Features :- SOFT TEXTURE - The fabric is smooth to the touch, making this a comfortable piece to lounge and relax on- Includes: One (1) Loveseat- Style: Glam- Finish: Blue- Materials: Solid Wood, Wood Veneer, Polyester- Removable seat cushion- Flared and curving arms- Nailhead trim- Tufted camel-back- Crystal-like acrylic buttons- Accent pillows included- Easy to follow step by step assembly guide included.Specifications :- Product Dimensions : 76"W x 34.5"D x 34"H- Seat Dimensions : 24"D x 20"H- Product Weight : 100 lbs- Weight Capacity : 350 lbs- Assembly Required : Yes- Warranty Description : 1-Year Manufacture Limited Replacement Parts Warranty.
